title: S&P 500 Drops as ‘AI Scare Trade’ Overshadows Strong Jobs Data
description: US stocks pared an early advance on Wednesday as worries around the impact of artificial intelligence on several industries curtailed a rally fueled by strong employment data.
content: US stocks pared an early advance on Wednesday as worries around the impact of artificial intelligence on several industries curtailed a rally fueled by strong employment data.
